arts.ttl: Serie A Preview: Napoli vs Como – Team News, Line-ups & Prediction
arts.sum: Napoli continue their Serie A title defense at home as they take on early-season surprise package Como on Saturday evening. Stadio Diego Armando Maradona forms the backdrop for only the third top-flight meeting between the sides in the 21st century.
